issue.title: Splitwise Clone - Modern Expense Sharing App
issue.body:
## Overview
Build a modern, polished expense-sharing web app. Friends can track shared expenses and settle debts easily.

## Features

### Authentication
- Google OAuth sign-in
- Email/password sign-up and login
- Secure session management

### Groups
- Create expense groups (roommates, trips, events)
- Invite members by email
- Dashboard showing all groups with balance summaries

### Expenses
- Add expenses with description, amount, who paid
- Split equally or custom amounts per person
- Expense history with filtering

### Balances & Settlements
- Real-time balance calculations
- Simplified debt algorithm (minimize transactions)
- One-click settle up

### Real-time Updates
- Live updates when expenses are added
- No page refresh needed

## Tech Stack & Libraries

### Setup Requirements
Run these to get latest versions:
```bash
npx create-next-app@latest --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app
npx shadcn@latest init
npm install better-sqlite3 @types/better-sqlite3
npm install next-auth @auth/core
npm install lucide-react
npm install socket.io socket.io-client
```

### Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14 App Router
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui components
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Database**: SQLite with better-sqlite3
- **Auth**: NextAuth.js with Google + Credentials providers
- **Real-time**: Socket.io

## Design Requirements

### Visual Style
- Clean, minimal design - NOT generic AI-generated look
- Thoughtful use of whitespace
- Subtle shadows and borders
- Consistent color palette (pick something distinctive, not purple gradients)
- Smooth micro-animations on interactions

### Mobile First
- Responsive design that works great on phones
- Touch-friendly tap targets
- Bottom navigation on mobile
- Swipe gestures where appropriate

### Components to Use (shadcn/ui)
- Card, Button, Input, Avatar
- Dialog for modals
- Dropdown menu for actions
- Toast for notifications
- Tabs for navigation

## Pages
- `/` - Landing page (marketing)
- `/login` - Auth page (Google + email/password)
- `/dashboard` - Groups overview
- `/groups/[id]` - Group detail with expenses & balances
- `/groups/new` - Create group
- `/settings` - User settings

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. Create package.json with all dependencies (better-sqlite3, next-auth, socket.io, lucide-react), configure tsconfig.json, set up .gitignore, initialize shadcn/ui, and create base directory structure (app/, components/, lib/, server/) for the entire application.

analysisSummary: Build a modern expense-sharing app with Next.js 14, featuring Google/email authentication, group management, expense tracking with custom splits, real-time balance calculations using simplified debt algorithm, and live Socket.io updates. Styled with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components for a clean, mobile-first experience.

pendingEMs.task: Build authentication system with NextAuth.js. Implement Google OAuth and email/password credential providers. Create API routes in app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts. Design and implement database schema for users (SQLite with better-sqlite3) in lib/db/schema.ts. Build database client in lib/db/client.ts. Create login/signup pages at app/login/page.tsx with auth forms. Implement secure session management and protected route middleware.

Implement core data models and business logic for groups and expenses. Create lib/db/models.ts with Group, Expense, User, and Balance models. Build CRUD operations for groups (create, invite members) in lib/db/groups.ts. Implement expense tracking with equal/custom splits in lib/db/expenses.ts. Build simplified debt algorithm to minimize transactions in lib/db/balances.ts. Create API routes: app/api/groups/route.ts, app/api/groups/[id]/route.ts, app/api/expenses/route.ts. All database operations use better-sqlite3 with prepared statements.

Build real-time Socket.io server and client integration. Create Socket.io server in lib/socket/server.ts with event handlers for expense-added, group-updated, balance-changed events. Implement Socket.io client hook in hooks/useSocket.ts. Set up Socket.io API route at app/api/socket/io.ts. Integrate socket listeners with group and expense components. Build main application pages: app/dashboard/page.tsx (groups overview), app/groups/[id]/page.tsx (group detail with expenses), app/groups/new/page.tsx (create group). Create reusable UI components in components/groups/ and components/expenses/ using shadcn/ui (Card, Button, Dialog, Tabs, Avatar). Implement toast notifications for real-time updates.
